name: Neonoen
detailed_description:
Embark on a dangerous journey through the dark, labyrinth-like fortress of Neonorn to try to save the light of creation itself from eternal darkness.

Making your way through Neonorn won't be easy though. You only have a limited amount of energy before you too, fade into oblivion. You'll need to use your time and energy wisely, or perish.

Unless you solve the ancient puzzles set before you by the builders of the fortress, you won't be getting very far. Some puzzles may reveal a hidden path or mysterious relics and items which could prove useful to you.

The most dangerous part of your journey will be when you face off against several epic guardian bosses in strategic, fast paced combat that will test your mettle as a neon warrior, and your worthiness to gaze upon the shard of creation, Neonorn.

Many will try, and many will fail. Will you be the one to save Neonorn from the darkness?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel E7500 or AMD Phenom II X4
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GT 530 or AMD Radeon HD 5570
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-5675C or AMD 6410 or higher
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 750 or AMD Radeon R7 250 or higher
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
